txt.en: Helgi Goblinbane's stern visage once more overlooks this hall
You have retrieved all the pieces of the statue which the goblins had stolen and scattered.

'You have gathered all of the pieces of Helgi Goblinbane's statue! Uxi is waiting for you at the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\n'The statue is now ready to be assembled once again, to strike fear into the hearts of goblins and Orcs in all of Moria!'
Uxi is in the Chamber of the Cross-roads in Durin's Way.\n\nYou should return to Uxi, for you have gathered all of the missing pieces of the statue of Helgi Goblinbane.
'You have gathered all of the pieces of Helgi Goblinbane's statue!\n\n'The statue is now ready to be assembled once again, to strike fear into the hearts of goblins and Orcs in all of Moria!'
Uxi is in the Chamber of the Cross-roads in Durin's Way.\n\nYou should return to Uxi, for you have gathered all of the missing pieces of the statue of Helgi Goblinbane.

The shattered statue is in the centre of the court, within view of Uxi.\n\nUxi instructed you to take the mortar to the shattered statue and put it back together with the pieces you recovered from all over Moria.
'Quickly, put it back together before the mortar dries!'

'You have gathered all of the pieces of Helgi Goblinbane's statue! Uxi is waiting for you at the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\n'The statue is now ready to be assembled once again, to strike fear into the hearts of goblins and Orcs in all of Moria!'
Uxi is in the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\nYou should return to Uxi to celebrate the statue's reassembly.
'It is an incredible thing you have done, [placeholder]! You should be proud.'

'You have gathered all of the pieces of Helgi Goblinbane's statue! Uxi is waiting for you at the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\n'The statue is now ready to be assembled once again, to strike fear into the hearts of goblins and Orcs in all of Moria!'
'You have safe-guarded not only our art and history by your actions, [placeholder], but also our pride!'

'You have gathered all of the pieces of Helgi Goblinbane's statue! Uxi is waiting for you at the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\n'The statue is now ready to be assembled once again, to strike fear into the hearts of goblins and Orcs in all of Moria!'
Talk to Uxi at the Chamber of the Cross-roads

'You have gathered all of the pieces of Helgi Goblinbane's statue! Uxi is waiting for you at the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\n'The statue is now ready to be assembled once again, to strike fear into the hearts of goblins and Orcs in all of Moria!'
Put the statue back together
Talk to Uxi at the Chamber of the Cross-roads

'[placeholder], you have done what I thought was the impossible! Because of your actions, the name of Helgi Goblinbane shall continue to strike fear into the hearts of the Orc-kind within Khazad-dûm.\n\n'The statue-base is there in the centre of the court. Will you do the honours of reassembling it?'
Reassembling the Statue

'Bellows and anvil, [placeholder]; what a long, strange trip you've been on. Those goblins and their Orkish allies nearly got away with their plan to erase the name of the legendary Helgi Goblinbane from not only their memory, but perhaps, in time, also from ours!\n\n'I... this is such a beautiful act, from one who is not even planning to settle permanently within Khazad-dûm's magnificent halls. I am so proud of you! I just... I... excuse me. I seem to have a fleck of stone-dust in my eye....'
